entry.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18912)
entry.content:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere

entry.title: we have extra vegetarian and meat burritos!!
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we have extra vegetarian and meat burritos!!

entry.title: we are ready preparing food for you. We will have pineapple...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

we are ready preparing food for you. We will have pineapple puddings and burritos. We have extra burritos in case you haven't placed your order yet!!

Yessenia and Carlos recently had their first third child, so theyâ€™re team cooking this weekend to balance work and caring for the new baby. You can order burritos from them at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: "When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros,...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

"When we fight and create, we say to our fallen companeros, 'you did not die when they killed you." -Eduardo Galleano

Join us for the 20th anniversary of the Four Directions All Nations March to celebrate the abolishment of Columbus day, to honor our Indigenous relatives who are still resisting the violence of colonialism and genocide, and to remember that we were once free Peoples, and we will be free again.

entry.title: Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yesterday myfriend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. Weâ€™re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-â€¦

entry.title: Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Today our friend Lupe will be having surgery. She will be having two delicate surgeries done at the same time, one to treat a hernia and the other to treat cancer in her kidney. She is an immigrant mother who has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills for the anesthesia. Weâ€™re asking for community to support her so we can take a little stress off her life. We are also asking for you to keep her in your thoughts and prayers today. Her family is so grateful for the community support. https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-â€¦

entry.title: Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Emergency call. Today, our friend Guadalupe Urquidez will be entering surgery. She will be having 2 surgeries done at the same time that are very delicate, one hernia and cancer in a kidney. She is an immigrant mother that has been working very hard to keep going. She does not have any medical insurance and she will have to pay the medical bills. We ask the help of the community to help her so we could take off a little stress off her life. We are also asking for support that it all goes well, her family will be very grateful that the community will give this support.

Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share an suport

For the last year, Lupe has been suffering from an abdominal hernia. Itâ€™s beâ€¦ Sofia Halpin needs your support for Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment

gofundme.com

Help Lupe Pay for Cancer & Hernia Treatment, organized by Sofia Halpin

Yessenia and her husband Carlos are selling smothered burritos and flan this weekend! If youâ€™ve been looking for vegetarian green chile, donâ€™t miss it. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
